about_the_game:
Advent 2 Book

This Advent 2 themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Each image is based around the Holiday season! Winter wonderlands, Santa Claus, toastie fireplaces and more!

Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true advent calendar!

Contents

The Advent 2 book unlocks the following images:
  • Day 1: Santa's Little Helper - 58x87
  • Day 2: Gingerbread House - 95x72
  • Day 3: A Letter to Santa - 29x29
  • Day 4: Tree Baubles - 69x79
  • Day 5: Winter Campsite - 179x110
  • Day 6: Baubles - 127x52
  • Day 7: Winter Birds - 193x102
  • Day 8: Snowman - 52x98
  • Day 9: Gingerbread - 21x32
  • Day 10: WInter Cabin - 118x119
  • Day 11: Santa's Sleigh - 159x47
  • Day 12: Bell - 31x23
  • Day 13: Christmas Tree - 180x179
  • Day 14: Santa Claus - 77x91
  • Day 15: Christmas Pattern - 150x150
  • Day 16: Santa's Grotto - 251x157
  • Day 17: Angel - 82x98
  • Day 18: Mrs Claus - 44x93
  • Day 19: Reindeer - 83x99
  • Day 20: Candle - 29x51
  • Day 21: Winter Forest - 147x87
  • Day 22: Love Birds - 188x145
  • Day 23: Cute Reindeer - 149x181
  • Day 24: Christmas Eve - 302x183

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Advent 2 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
